Curator's Notes.notes: Archguns are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Archmelees are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Archwings are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Companions are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

AshAIO.buildGoals: |  ⇈ DUR  |  175 EFF  |  ⇊ RAN  |  145 STR  |  Aug1opt  |  Aug3  |
AshAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Rathuum | Void Fissures |
AshAIO.notes: Ash's armor removal and/or bypass makes it so that not a lot of Strength is needed as long as abilities are spammed consistently.

AtlasAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
AtlasAIO.notes: Landslide has decent damage scaling but is held back by relative inability to deal with armor past the starchart. Nonetheless the raw damage is sufficient to deal with Sortie-level enemies.

BansheeSonar.suitableMissionsRanked: | Capture | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Void Fissures |
BansheeSonar.notes: Sonar's effects can overlap onto the same spot, adding multipliers to a current multiplier.

BansheeQuake.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
BansheeQuake.notes: Augmented Soundquake has decent map-clearing potential but is limited by it's relative inability to deal with armor past starchart levels.

BansheeSilence.notes: Silence can be used to stagger keep enemies unalerted for the stealth affinity bonus.

BaruukAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Solo | Survival |
BaruukAIO.notes: Baruuk's kit work in unison by evading attacks while not attacking himself, sleeping his enemies, and easily maintainable 90% damage reduction, he can hardly be killed. Serene Storm can be activated once some Restraint is eroded, but is ultimately underpowered compared to other exalted weaponry despite being easily maintained.

BaruukCC.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Solo | Survival |
BaruukCC.notes: Long duration Lull can easily lock down an entire map and effictively stall the mission until the timer runs out.

ChromaTank.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo |
ChromaTank.notes: 9/10 Eidolon Hunters recommend Chroma. The last one uses something else but secretly wishes that his riven and his build is up to snuff.

ChromaBuff.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo |
ChromaBuff.notes: Would have been top, but since teaming up would assume some form of coordination it is expected that the Chroma stay a little more still and teammates gather around him for warmth instead.

EquinoxSleep.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | Interception | Mobile Defense |
EquinoxSleep.notes: One of the best sleep abilities. Can also be used for rapid solo affinity farm on weapons and focus by stacking the stealth combo counter.

EquinoxMaim.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
EquinoxMaim.notes: One of the few endgame scaling AOE damage abilities. Becomes exponentially more powerful with a coordinated team of damage buff and another similarly built Equinox.

EquinoxProvoke.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Survival | Void Fissures |
EquinoxProvoke.notes: Buff your teammates' Power Strength while debuffing enemies with damage amp with Day aspect. Or you can switch to defensive debuff on the enemies with the Night aspect, which does count the excess efficiency.

ExcaliburIndex.notes: Unique interactions (unlimited weapon ammo) makes Umbra specter really good at killing enemies in Index when equipped with a relatively ammo-inefficient but powerful weapon like Kohm. Since Umbra will not use any abilities while enemies are not in range of it, reducing Range to minimum will ensure that he focuses only on firing the weapon to devastating effect.

ExcaliburEB.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
ExcaliburEB.notes: The best exalted melee in game. Each Augmented Slash Dash provides multiple additions to the combo counter and will excessively increase damage output. Best used with [Drifting Contact] on the EB and Naramon school.

FrostBubble.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defense | Excavation | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense |
FrostBubble.notes: Very few other frames excel at preventing a static objective from being shot at.

FrostCC.buildGoals: |  ↓ DUR  |  ⇈ EFF  |  ⇈ RAN  |  ⇊ STR  |  Aug2opt  |  Aug3  |
FrostCC.notes: Delay-based build for covering large areas with crowd control. A large snowglobe can cover interception points indefinitely while Augmented Ice Wave will keep other enemies slowed down.

FrostNuke.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Solo | Survival |
FrostNuke.notes: Despite having a protective coating you can still build up [Adaptation] stacks, which is great for survivability.

GaraNuke.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
GaraNuke.notes: Another highly scaling AOE damage ability as Mass Vitrify's explosion damage is derived from Shattered Lash which in turn draws damage from melee mods. This makes maxing out range easier compared with other builds. However, the nuke is relatively complex and a properly built statstick is necessary.

GaraAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Defection | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Medallion Farming | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Sorties | Survival | Void Fissures |
GaraAIO.notes: This build is more focused on a long duration Splinter Storm with high range to create a walking aura of damage that can trivialize most content once the damage is properly built up. A proper statstick is necessary.

GaraShield.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defection | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Rescue | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Sorties | Survival |
GaraShield.notes: 90% damage reduction is very good for when a specific mobile objective needs to be protected at all costs. Since Splinter Storm is refreshable this build is more suitable for buff-and-forget instead.

GarudaAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
GarudaAIO.notes: Combining her 1 and 3 means you can survive any attacks unless you get hit by nullifiers or forget to refresh the duration while having nearly +100% damage.

GarudaHealer.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
GarudaHealer.notes: Creating 3 altars to keep a semi-static team alive is great especially when healing is scarce.

HarrowAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
HarrowAIO.notes: It's really hard to build Harrow wrong (and therefore hard to build him perfectly), especially since his entire kit works in unison and therefore requires different stats to work together. One of the preferred proc prevention frames in Eidolon hunting.

HildrynSuper.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Defection | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
HildrynSuper.notes: One of the few frames that require arcanes to really shine, since Arcane Aegis' regeneration won't be canceled by damage to shields. This allows for relatively unlimited usage of abilities as well as survivability.

HildrynBudget.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Defection | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
HildrynBudget.notes: The poor man's Hildryn build is still viable but requires no arcanes if a shield regenerating weapon is used while spamming Shield Pillage.

HydroidLoot.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Survival | Void Fissures |
HydroidLoot.notes: Puddle first then charge up the Tentacles to double up the loot. Works very well with a Zenistar for relatively pain-free material and mod farming. A well-aimed Tempest Barrage can destroy a Nullifier bubble in a single cast but the Zenistar usually takes care of that.

HydroidPuddle.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assault | Defection | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Survival |
HydroidPuddle.notes: Curative Undertow build for healing teammates.

InarosTank.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
InarosTank.notes: One of the few frames that require arcanes to really shine, since with a little health regeneration Inaros is pretty much unkillable even when surrounded by active nullifiers.

IvaraSleep.notes: The most reliable way to max out a weapon on a single run. Higher strength to increase the headshot multiplier from Prowl. Sleep arrow can reset alert status an enemy no matter the condition.

IvaraAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Eidolon Hunt | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | Index | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Solo | Sorties |
IvaraAIO.notes: Artemis Bow's has great stats and high innate multishot making it excellent at boss-killing as long as AOE attacks can be dealt with. Strength scaling affects Augmented Dashwire and Artemis Bow.

IvaraCC.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | Interception | Mobile Defense |
IvaraCC.notes: Using Noise Arrow and Sleep Arrow to indefinitely delay a mission. Noise Arrows will eventually break the AI and turn them completely unalerted, allowing you to clear a mission without further interference.

IvaraProwl.buildGoals: |  Balanced  |  ↓ DUR  |  ⇈ EFF  |  Aug3  |  Roll speed  |
IvaraProwl.notes: Great for dealing with pesky Corpus spy rooms until you've mastered the patterns. Can also be used for Prowl farming some enemies but there are faster farming methods. However, Prowl-pickpocketing Life Support from enemies to fulfill the no-kill survival Riven challenge is possible.

KhoraAIO.buildGoals: |  ↓ DUR  |  175 EFF  |  ⇈ RAN  |  ⇊ STR  |  Aug1  |  Aug4opt  |
KhoraAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Survival | Void Fissures |
KhoraAIO.notes: Stacking damage from whipclaw's Augment is more than enough to counteract the lowered power strength. Augmented Strangledome causes increases drops which is better AOE damage but capped at 68% increase. With high range, Ensnare can capture unalerted enemies and keep them in an unalerted state for potential stealth kills. Double [Primed Animal Instinct] also offers great utility.

LimboCata.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Defense | Excavation | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense |
LimboCata.notes: When a build only has nullifiers as its weakness, you know it's good. Stay in Rift, press 2, aim at obj and press 4. Repeat. Change range depending on existence of nullifiers in mission.

LimboLoot.notes: Press 4 twice to break any boxes within range so that you can easily see Syndicate Medallion or Caches in the minimap.

LimboSurge.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Mobile Defense | Void Fissures |
LimboSurge.notes: Same usage as Cataclysm, except this time you also press 3 and then banish enemies that have been affected by Rift Surge. Damage scaling is absurd if many enemies are caught in the effect.

LimboBanish.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defection | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Rescue | Rescue | Sorties |
LimboBanish.notes: While in normal plane, send allies into the rift to heal them. Makes Defections or any missions where you need to keep an Operative alive a breeze.

LokiSwitchTP.notes: Extremely good at moving mobile objectives like POE drones closer to the objective.

LokiStealth.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rathuum | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
LokiStealth.notes: Very useful for rushing through missions with Loki's high innate speed.

LokiDisarm.notes: One of the highest ranged disarm abilities in game. Adding the Augment delays the enemies from being able to act effectively against the objective even more.

MagBubble.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
MagBubble.notes: Run in, disarm and bubble one enemy. Shoot  the bubble with a projectile weapon and let the damage commence. Aug3 helps with surviability, as well as [Adaptation] as Mag's Crush can gain overshields.

MesaAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Void Fissures |
MesaAIO.notes: Shatter Shield can redirect up to 95% of an enemy's ranged attack. Mesa's Peacemakers are best modded for fire speed and forgoing [Hornet Strike] due to how it interacts with Power Strength. Damage can ramp up to extreme levels but it's inability to target weakspots will hamper usefulness against certain VIPs.

MirageEclipse.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Survival | Void Fissures |
MirageEclipse.notes: Buff your teammates with multiplicative weapon damage. Might have some issues with identifying bright areas during mobile missions, but is one of the highest damage amplification abilities. Eclipse also increases Scanners' speed.

MirageMurder.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
MirageMurder.notes: Extreme weapon damage amp would have been great if Mirage isn't a total pushover. Doppelganger shots can also proc status despite having lower damage than the main so build your weapons accordingly.

MiragePrism.notes: Blind would have been good if LoS is not needed for the crowd control.

MirageNuke.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
MirageNuke.notes: Explosive Legerdemain turns all ammo pickups into proximity mines that will explode for signficant damage once stacked. A Nekros or Hydroid in the team to increase the number of pickups increasese the damage potential.

NekrosLoot.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defection | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Medallion Farming | Mobile Defense | Survival |
NekrosLoot.notes: Desecrate can almost double your loot if accompanied with an appropriate loadout of dismembering weapons. Shield of Shadows can create a buffer between enemies and an objective semi-reliably. When all else fails, Terrify will get rid of the remaining enemies.

NezhaAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Defection | Defense | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
NezhaAIO.notes: Truly the Jack of all Trades but Master of None, Nezha's entire kit synergizes well together but requires different stats. Using Warding Halo to protect yourself or allies while utilizing Chakram on enemies affected by Divine Spears to force another Chakram out.

NezhaDelay.notes: With a base duration of 12 seconds, Divine Spears can keep a sufficiently large area locked down for a long time when modded properly. Does not work as a stealth farm tool as it alerts enemies.

NezhaNuke.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
NezhaNuke.notes: Divine Spears have a decent enough damage to last the starchart. Fixed damage and inabillity to deal with armor hampers the scaling.

NezhaChakram.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
NezhaChakram.notes: Chakram's damage multiplier is applied as a debuff on enemies after all other damage is calculated. Drawback is the limit on how many enemies it can affect and some VIPs immunity to debuffs.

NidusLink.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
NidusLink.notes: By far the biggest Power Strength buff you can get in game. Parasitic Link is slightly limited as it can only amplify one Ally and requires the teammate to build appropriately.

NidusTank.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
NidusTank.notes: Linking to an enemy can grant up to 90% damage reduction, which makes Nidus nigh invincible considering his natural stats.

NidusStomp.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
NidusStomp.notes: Virulence is very strong when stacks are up, but takes too much time to ramp up for quicker missions.

NovaSpeed.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Medallion Farming | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
NovaSpeed.notes: No other abilities grant both double damage and an increase in enemy speed with so much coverage. One of the few actual use case for [Power Donation]. Augment compensates for Nova's poor survivability.

NovaSlow.notes: No other abilities grant both double damage and a decrease in enemy speed with so much coverage. Augment compensates for Nova's poor survivability.

NovaPortal.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Defection | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
NovaPortal.notes: Impressive speed when mastered while also being able to move POE drones along. Also consider lowering range for smaller/tighter maps.

NovaAMD.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
NovaAMD.notes: Augmented Antimatter Drop can be used to block enemy weapon fire and bypasses terrain. Drawback of needing to charge the ball and fixed range of subsequent explosion limits this ability.

NyxChaos.notes: Extremely useful for completely stalling a mission's timer. Advantage compared to Loki's Irradiating Disarm is that enemies will also shoot nullifier bubbles. Augment is useful but it is often easier to just recast.

NyxBubble.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defense | Excavation | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense |
NyxBubble.notes: Can be used defensively to protect an objective from being harmed, but limited to smaller objectives. Raised threat level also forces enemies to redirect fire to you but is not as good as other defensive barrier's coverage. Uniquely, [Rift Strike] on Twin Basolk allows for greater mobility when required.

OberonHealer.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | FR-Assassinate | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
OberonHealer.notes: Defensive babysitter build mostly for keeping allies and opertives alive. Augmented 3 provides instant revive every 90s which is useful for glass cannon frames.

OberonEidolon.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defection | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Drone Hijack | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
OberonEidolon.notes: Eidolon Hunter build. Augmented Smite buff on allies can be used to great effect as Eidolons are weak to Radiation.

OberonNuke.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
OberonNuke.notes: AOE nuking and armor removal build. Laying down Hallowed Grounds and casting Reckoning twice completely removes armor.

OctaviaStealth.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
OctaviaStealth.notes: Octavia's unique and refreshable invisibility can be managed to 100% uptime while maintaining full mobility. The buff can be applied across the team with some coordination.

OctaviaMallet.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Defense | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Kuva Survival | Mobile Defense | Void Fissures |
OctaviaMallet.notes: Mallet is one of the very few Warframe abilities that is effective against Nullifiers. Amp doubles the range and can cover the entire room in a Defense mission.

OctaviaBuff.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
OctaviaBuff.notes: Team buff build that is both high in utility and damage potential. A viable option for Eidolon Hunting although not recommended as Octavia would not survive the AOE damage. The Opera effect from Metronome also affects Scanners' speed.

RevenantAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
RevenantAIO.notes: Revenant's kit grants him both offensive and defensive capabilities at the cost of some mobility.

RhinoSolo.buildGoals: |  ↓ DUR  |  ⇈ EFF  |  ↓ RAN  |  ⇈ STR  |  Aug1  |  Aug2  |
RhinoSolo.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Hijack | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
RhinoSolo.notes: An all-rounded build that utilises most of Rhino's offensive and defensive abilities. Ironclad Charge scales better than [Steel Fibre] even if you just hit two enemies.

RhinoBuff.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
RhinoBuff.notes: Roar scales after weapon damage mods and is one of the best damage buff to you and your allies. Range can be reduced in a coordinated team. One of the DPS-enhancing options for an Eidolon hunt.

RhinoStomp.notes: A unique build for crowd control. Enemies are thrown into the air for the duration and will enter knockdown-like state after. Enemies stuck in the air will remain unalerted and this makes the stealth focus farm in exterminate maps possible.

SarynESO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
SarynESO.notes: Saryn has high range for Spores and Miasma. Enemies that die from sources other than Spore also spread it outwards with increasing damage. Equipping [Healing Return] provides nigh endless health regen and the loss in DPS hardly noticeable due to the plethora of status effects.

SarynMelee.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
SarynMelee.notes: Turn Saryn into a melee platform by spreading 3 status effects to jumpstart [Condition Overload]. Toxic Lash bursts all spores for re-application of the Corrosive effect and each spore burst with your melee weapon adds to the combo counter. Equipping [Healing Return] provides nigh endless health regen and the loss in DPS hardly noticeable.

TitaniaAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Eidolon Hunt | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Rescue | Sabotage |
TitaniaAIO.notes: Dex Pixia has great damage potential but Razorwing disables companion abilities and Titania herself has limited survivability. Debuffing enemies with her other abilites will trigger the Augment and increase her Fire Rate and Movement Speed. Titania is one of the best frames for killing Plague Star's boss due to Dex Pixia's mechanics.

TrinityEV.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | FR-Assassinate | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Hijack | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
TrinityEV.notes: No other frames give the team as much energy as fast as an EV Trinity. Augment also adds Overshields and is a viable case for survivability when stacked with [Adaptation].

TrinityBless.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Rescue | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Sorties | Survival |
TrinityBless.notes: Within affinity range, heal teammates to full health and provide 75% damage resistance. No other frames can come close to the speed of the heal. Very useful for keeping Eidolon Lures alive.

TrinityLink.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Exploiter Orb | FR-Assassinate | Hijack | Index | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
TrinityLink.notes: Abating Link removes all armor from enemies and redirect the damage to them. Combine with Blessing to gain high survivability.

ValkyrMelee.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
ValkyrMelee.notes: Valkyr excels as a melee platform due to her innate stats and the bonus from Warcry that is easily maintained by the Augment.

VoltESO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Defense | Excavation | FR-Liberation | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Infested Salvage | Kuva Survival | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival |
VoltESO.notes: One of the few top ESO farming frames. Duration maintains Discharge's effects on enemies and thus increases DPS. Augmented Discharge can gain Overshield which synergizes with [Adaptation] for even greater survivability.

VoltEidolon.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Capture | Defense | Eidolon Hunt | Excavation | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Index | Infested Salvage | Interception | Kuva Survival | Profit Taker Orb | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Survival | Void Fissures |
VoltEidolon.notes: Good for defending a specific objective or Eidolon hunting. Angle up to three Electric Shields around an objective to prevent any gunfire to it.

VoltSpeed.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Rescue | Sabotage | Spy |
VoltSpeed.notes: Volt's Speed is an easily applied buff to the team. Very useful for speedrunning any content.

WispPlatform.suitableMissionsRanked: | Assault | Capture | Defense | Exterminate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | Index | Kuva Survival | Solo | Sorties | Survival |
WispPlatform.notes: Reservoirs last forever, but the lingering effects allow for a great degree of mobility as long as the cooldown is appropriately managed. The triple Motes allow for a great melee platform since it covers all the bases.

WukongAIO.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Eidolon Hunt | Exploiter Orb | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Hijack | Index | Interception | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival | Void Fissures |
WukongAIO.notes: Post-rework Wukong has great survivability with Defy's armor bonus and a panic button in Cloud Walker. The Celestial Twin also draw some aggro away from you while doubling your effective DPS. All of Wukong's ability synergizes with his clone.

ZephyrTailWind.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | Assault | Capture | Exterminate | Exterminate - Focus affinity farm | Exterminate - Weapon affinity farm | FR-Assassinate | FR-Cache Recovery | FR-Capture | FR-Drone Hijack | FR-Exterminate | FR-Liberation | FR-Rescue | FR-Resource Theft | FR-Supply Sabotage | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Rescue | Sabotage | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Spy | Survival |
ZephyrTailWind.notes: Tail Wind is very useful for traversing large maps without the use of an Archwing Launcher. It can also be adapted for indoor maps and cancelled using slam attacks but will require some practise.

ZephyrTurb.suitableMissionsRanked: | Arbitration | Assassination | FR-Assassinate | Kuva Siphons/Floods | Kuva Survival | Rathuum | Sanctuary Onslaught (Elite)  | Solo | Survival |
ZephyrTurb.notes: Turbulence redirects any gunfire away from Zephyr. The Augment increases Projectile Flight Speed and therefore makes arrows fly straighter and increases the range before shotguns' falloff.

ZephyrTornado.suitableMissionsRanked: | Exterminate | FR-Assassinate | FR-Capture | FR-Exterminate | FR-Rescue | Interception | Void Fissures |
ZephyrTornado.notes: Fire into Tornados to increase their damage. Tornados also rapidly re-apply status effects on the victims and is a prime candidate for Gas or Corrosive. Trying to control the summoned tornados, however, is like herding cats so good luck with that.

Arca Titron.name: Arca Titron
Arca Titron.notes: Kills grant up to 10 Capacitor (+100% electricity damage each) charges that is used on next slam attack. Slams also proc electricity and overrides hammer ragdoll.

Broken Scepter.name: Broken Scepter
Broken Scepter.notes: Can Drain enemies to spawn health/energy orb. Inconsistent performance.

Caustacyst.name: Caustacyst
Caustacyst.notes: Charge attack throws wave of Corrosive damage, staggers enemies and causes guaranteed slash proc on direct contact. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Cerata.name: Cerata
Cerata.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier.

Dark Split-Sword.name: Dark Split-Sword
Dark Split-Sword.notes: Heavy blade mode is relatively underpowered.

Dual Heat Swords.name: Dual Heat Swords
Dual Heat Swords.notes: Slam attacks procs Heat in an AOE. Inconsistent performance.

Ether Sword.name: Ether Sword
Ether Sword.notes: Slam attacks procs Radiation in an AOE. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Falcor.name: Falcor
Falcor.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Gazal Machete.name: Gazal Machete
Gazal Machete.notes: Can be paired with Djinn's Fatal Attraction for approximately 16.6% uptime. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Glaive Prime.name: Glaive Prime
Glaive Prime.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier.

Halikar Wraith.name: Halikar Wraith
Halikar Wraith.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Heat Dagger.name: Heat Dagger
Heat Dagger.notes: Slam attacks deal Heat damage and have high chance of proccing Heat.

Hirudo.name: Hirudo
Hirudo.notes: Upon crit, heal you for 5% of damage dealt, and gives up to 5 stacks of Invigorate (+5% max health, 15s). Inconsistent performance.

Jat Kittag.name: Jat Kittag
Jat Kittag.notes: Vulcan Blitz cause kills to explode dealing 300 (+60% of enemy health) Blast damage in 6m radius. Part of the Tenno Space Program.

Jaw Sword.name: Jaw Sword
Jaw Sword.notes: Blade of Truth increases damage by 100% and gives Truth (Gas, health, parkour) effects. Inconsistent performance.

Kestrel.name: Kestrel
Kestrel.notes: Entropy Flight grants +140% flight speed and Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects. Inconsistent performance.

Kogake Prime.name: Kogake Prime
Kogake Prime.notes: Increases movement speed by 5% when equipped.

Lesion.name: Lesion
Lesion.notes: Causing status proc buffs the weapon to give it 15% more innate attack speed and toxin damage.

Mire.name: Mire
Mire.notes: Innate +10% toxin damage boost. Toxic Blight increases toxin damage by 100% and causes Blight (Viral, Energy) effects. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Ohma.name: Ohma
Ohma.notes: Slams have guaranteed Electricity proc in 8.5m radius. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Orvius.name: Orvius
Orvius.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier. Heavy Attack while Blocking suspends enemies in midair. Inconsistent performance.

Pangolin Prime.name: Pangolin Prime
Pangolin Prime.notes: Jump attacks always proc Electricity. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Pathocyst.name: Pathocyst
Pathocyst.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Pennant.name: Pennant
Pennant.notes: Increases attack speed after a heavy attack.

Prisma Dual Cleavers.name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
Prisma Dual Cleavers.notes: Augment adds Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects and +100% to base damage. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Prisma Obex.name: Prisma Obex
Prisma Obex.notes: Entropy Detonation cause ground finisher kills to explode for 1,000 (+20% enemy max health) Blast damage and Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects. Inconsistent performance.

Prisma Skana.name: Prisma Skana
Prisma Skana.notes: Bright Purity adds 100% melee damage and Purity (Corrosive, health) effects.

Prova Vandal.name: Prova Vandal
Prova Vandal.notes: Slam attacks always proc Electricity. Static Discharge deals 80% of weapon damage as Electricity damage to nearby enemies.

Quassus.name: Quassus
Quassus.notes: Heavy attacks launch 12 daggers that procs slash damage.

Rakta Dark Dagger.name: Rakta Dark Dagger
Rakta Dark Dagger.notes: Can use the Gleaming Blight augment for +100% Status Chance. Blight (Viral, energy, movement speed) effects. While wielded, enemies have reduced detection radius. Radiation procs restore shields and may grant overshields. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Redeemer Prime.combo: Single-tap Final Showdown into Heavy Attack
Redeemer Prime.name: Redeemer Prime
Redeemer Prime.notes: Shots from the gunblade only deals Blast damage and status effects unless modded for 100% status, which would grant IPS effects too. Would be advisable to get a high status chance riven for Redeemer as it would allow for Crit-based modding instead.

Ripkas.name: Ripkas
Ripkas.notes: Hunter's Bonesaw increases damage by 90% and status chance by 60% on grounded enemies. Inconsistent performance.

Sancti Magistar.name: Sancti Magistar
Sancti Magistar.notes: Innate 10% Blast effect proc. Reduces damage from status effects by 75%. Charge attacks heals nearby allies based on damage dealt.

Sarpa.combo: Single-tap Final Showdown into Heavy Attack
Sarpa.name: Sarpa

Secura Lecta.name: Secura Lecta
Secura Lecta.notes: Killing an enemy with this weapon equipped gives bonus credits.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Sibear.name: Sibear
Sibear.notes: Charge attacks gives +50% status chance for 4s. Inconsistent performance.

Silva & Aegis Prime.name: Silva & Aegis Prime
Silva & Aegis Prime.notes: Blocking adds up to 4 charges that increases critical and status chance by 15% additively. Avenging Truth absorbs 50% of incoming damage and releases it on the next charge attack and Truth (Gas, health, parkour) effects.

Skiajati.name: Skiajati
Skiajati.notes: Grants invisibility upon finisher, which will expire when attacking, using an ability, or after 5s.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Stropha.combo: Single-tap Final Showdown into Heavy Attack
Stropha.name: Stropha

Synoid Heliocor.name: Synoid Heliocor
Synoid Heliocor.notes: Scans kills into codex, and if the target's Codex entry is complete it will create a friendly Spectre of said target. Spectre lasts 30s. Inconsistent performance.

Tatsu.name: Tatsu
Tatsu.notes: Kills will grant up to 5 charges that can be expended upon slide attacks to launch a homing projectile which will also stun enemies.

Telos Boltace.name: Telos Boltace
Telos Boltace.notes: Slide attack triggers Stormpath, which vacuums enemies in a 14m radius. Retriggering Stormpath within 8s puts it into a 6s cooldown and ragdoll enemies. Also gives 20% boost to parkour.

Twin Basolk.name: Twin Basolk
Twin Basolk.notes: Rift Strike teleports user to a target within 25m on charge attack.

Vaykor Sydon.name: Vaykor Sydon
Vaykor Sydon.notes: Blocking adds up to 15 stacks, which will emit Radial Blind in a 15m radius for 5s upon reaching the 15th stack. Also adds 50% resistance to knockdown/knockback.

War.name: War
War.notes: What is it good for? Inconsistent performance.

Xoris.name: Xoris
Xoris.notes: Thrown glaives requires some degree of familiarization else the performance drops down by an entire tier.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Zenistar.name: Zenistar
Zenistar.notes: Charge attack deploys flying disc that deals AOE damage and allow the rest of the weapon to deal physical damage. Inconsistent performance.

Vastilok.combo: Single-tap Final Showdown into Heavy Attack
Vastilok.name: Vastilok

Aram.name: Cyath Polearm - Aram
Aram.notes: Cyath - Seekalla - Ekwana II Jai zaw with Exodia Force. About 5.5% better than Plague Kripath Strike. Take note of different combo usage compared with other Polearms.

Ashandarei.name: Sepfahn Staff - Ashandarei
Ashandarei.notes: Sepfahn - Seekalla - Ekwana II Jai zaw with Exodia Force. About 4.9% better than Plague Keewar strike.

Espada.name: Plague Kripath Rapier - Espada
Espada.notes: Plague Kripath - Peye - Vargeet II Jai zaw with Exodia Force. Switch to Exodia Brave for more utility. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Hundun.name: Dokrahm Heavy Blade - Hundun
Hundun.notes: Dokrahm - Seekalla - Ekwana II Jai zaw with Exodia Hunt. About 11.3% better than Exo Force.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Labrys.name: Plague Keewar Scythe - Labrys
Labrys.notes: Plague Keewar - Peye - Vargeet II Jai zaw with Exodia Force. Switch to Exodia Brave for more utility.

Machaera.name: Cyath Machete - Machaera
Machaera.notes: Cyath - Peye - Ekwana Jai II zaw with Exodia Force. About 14.5% better than Ekwana II Jai link.

Mikazuki.name: Sepfahn Nikana - Mikazuki
Mikazuki.notes: Sepfahn - Peye - Ekwana II Jai zaw with Exodia Force. About 10.7% better than Vargeet II Jai link.

Naegling.name: Ooltha Sword - Naegling
Naegling.notes: Ooltha - Peye - Ekwana II Jai zaw with Exodia Force. About 26.1% better than Vargeet II Jai.

Paracesis.name: Paracesis
Paracesis.notes: Has +60% damage bonus to sentients and resets their damage resistances.

Parazonium.name: Balla Dagger - Parazonium
Parazonium.notes: Balla - Peye - Ekwana II Jai Zaw with Exodia Force. Ekwana Jai II link is similar, but at a lower potential.

Ukonvasara.name: Rabvee Hammer - Ukonvasara
Ukonvasara.notes: Rabvee - Seekalla - Ekwana Jai II zaw with Exodia Hunt.

Garuda's Talons.name: Garuda's Talons
Garuda's Talons.notes: Only usable when Garuda is not equipping any other melee weapons.

Acceltra.name: Acceltra
Acceltra.notes: Projectiles explode on impact with an appreciable AOE while also requiring some travel distance. High fire rate and low ammo pool is impossible to manage without some manner of ammo mutation or restore.

Amprex.name: Amprex
Amprex.notes: Beam chains to nearby enemies giving it decent AOE. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Arca Plasmor.name: Arca Plasmor
Arca Plasmor.notes: Single pellet is wide with punchthrough and therefore can act as AOE and reliably proc status effects. Does not have a headshot multiplier.

Argonak.name: Argonak
Argonak.notes: Scoping highlights enemies for easier targetting. Alternate between semi-auto (higher DPS) and full-auto (higher fire rate) to deal with different enemies.

Astilla Prime.name: Astilla Prime
Astilla Prime.notes: Has a secondary explosion after the impact of the initial slug.

Basmu.name: Basmu
Basmu.notes: Reload takes 5 times longer if magazine is depleted.

Battacor.name: Battacor
Battacor.notes: Primary fire has two-round burst which is potentially wasteful. Every kill gives one secondary fire charge. Up to three charges can be stored for greater damage and crit chance. Recommend to expend secondary fire as soon as possible as it is a free shot and would increase overall DPS.

Baza Prime.name: Baza Prime
Baza Prime.notes: Completely silent but has damage falloff similar to shotguns.

Bubonico.name: Bubonico
Bubonico.notes: Secondary fire preferred due to Status Chance and AOE.

Burston Prime.name: Burston Prime
Burston Prime.notes: Gilded Truth (Arbiters of Hexis) increases fire rate and provide Truth effect (Gas, health, parkour). Unconfimable rumours that it is the strongest weapon with a riven.

Buzlok.name: Buzlok
Buzlok.notes: Alt fire launches tracer beacon which gives additive 50% Crit Chance (20 seconds) that remain active even the target is dead. Has insane DPS potential but difficult to attain due to difficulty in handling beacon and relatively poor handling.

Cedo.name: Cedo
Cedo.notes: Alt fire launches a (sic) glaive that bounces around with high status chance. Primary fire damage increases with Status Effect applied on victim similar to how Condition Overload works.

Cernos Prime.name: Cernos Prime
Cernos Prime.notes: Alt fire toggles firing pattern between horizontal and vertical (+50% headshot damage).

Convectrix.name: Convectrix
Convectrix.notes: Primary fire brings the beam from wide to narrow while alt fire sweeps the beam. Alt fire sweeps the beam from narrow to wide instead and is useful for applying status effects to large crowds. [Efficient Beams] consumes no ammo while not dealing damage. This makes it possible to keep the beam narrow for maximum concentrated damage without hurting ammo economy.

Corinth Prime.name: Corinth Prime
Corinth Prime.notes: Alt fire is useful when the reload button is harder to reach than the secondary fire button.

Ferrox.name: Ferrox
Ferrox.notes: Munition shot the moment it is fully charged. Alt fire should be used to reduce reliance on primary weapons.

Fulmin.name: Fulmin
Fulmin.notes: Primary fire has a small cone-like AoE. Secondary fire toggles automatic hitscan fire mode. Switching between the two is slow and clunky. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Harpak.name: Harpak
Harpak.notes: Three-round burst is wasteful at times. Alt fire launches a harpoon can be used to drag enemies closer. Exposing Harpoon augment gives it the edge needed to compte but still relatively lacklustre.

Hema.name: Hema
Hema.notes: Heals warframe on headshots. Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Hind.name: Hind
Hind.notes: Alt fire has better DPS on paper but due to low fire rate it still doesn't do enough.

Ignis Wraith.name: Ignis Wraith
Ignis Wraith.notes: AOE works like how you'd imagine an actual flamethrower would.

Javlok.name: Javlok
Javlok.notes: Alt fire creats a localized explosion.

Kohm.name: Kohm
Kohm.notes: Spool up increases multishot up to 8x base level as well as having insane innate punchthrough.

Komorex.name: Komorex
Komorex.notes: Second zoom level has a secondary explosion upon impact (3.5m and Viral damage) and +100% damage. Innate ammo mutation helps with excessive ammo consumption.

Lanka.name: Lanka
Lanka.notes: Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Chance (20%/30%/50%). Innate Electric damage and high direct damage potential makes the Lanka the choice weapon for Eidolon hunting.

Lenz.name: Lenz
Lenz.notes: Each arrow procs procs Impact on direct hit, Cold AOE immediately afterwards, and finally Blast AOE explosion.

Miter.name: Miter
Miter.notes: Neutralizing Justice can instantly destroy nullifier bubbles and has Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects.

Mutalist Cernos.name: Mutalist Cernos
Mutalist Cernos.notes: Fully charged arrows leave a gas trail that continues to proc status effects. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Mutalist Quanta.name: Mutalist Quanta
Mutalist Quanta.notes: Alt fire creats a bubble that can be combined up to three times. Firing through the bubble increase damage and critical chance. Bursting Mass changes the interaction by absorbing 200% of the damage passing through and detonating it every time another bubble is launched.

Nagantaka.name: Nagantaka
Nagantaka.notes: Headshots have a chance to increase reload speed. Secondary fire empties clip with little additional recoil and is highly recommended.

Ogris.name: Ogris
Ogris.notes: Nightwatch Napalm turns the Ogris into an area denial weapon.

Opticor.name: Opticor
Opticor.notes: Do not stare directly into beam.

Panthera Prime.name: Panthera Prime
Panthera Prime.notes: Primary fire projectiles can bounce up to 3 times and explode. Alt-fire puts a spinning blade a few meters in from of the weapon that constantly spin and deal damage.

Paracyst.name: Paracyst
Paracyst.notes: Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Phage.name: Phage
Phage.notes: Scoping narrows down the beam to a single point.

Phantasma.name: Phantasma
Phantasma.notes: Primary fire has usable AOE. Alt fire charges the weapon to fire an exploding glob that also releases seeking projectiles. Longer charge imparts more damage.

Prisma Gorgon.name: Prisma Gorgon
Prisma Gorgon.notes: Roll for recoil reduction in riven.

Prisma Grinlok.name: Prisma Grinlok
Prisma Grinlok.notes: Augment adds 200% CC and Sequence (Radiation, Shields, Max Shields)

Proboscis Cernos.name: Proboscis Cernos
Proboscis Cernos.notes: Arrows embed onto targets and create tendrils to pull nearby enemies before finally exploding after 1.7s. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Quanta Vandal.name: Quanta Vandal
Quanta Vandal.notes: Could do with punchthrough but build is tight as it is. Alt fire useful to learn Euclidean geometry.

Quartakk.name: Quartakk
Quartakk.notes: Four-shot burst is wasteful at times.

Quellor.name: Quellor
Quellor.notes: Secondary fire has a post-fire delay before the next action, whether it be reloading or going back to primary fire.

Rakta Cernos.name: Rakta Cernos
Rakta Cernos.notes: Good syndicate proc (Viral + energy restore) helps weaken enemies for the Slash proc from Hunters Munitions.

Rubico Prime.name: Rubico Prime
Rubico Prime.notes: Sniper combo counter rampup is amazing (min. 1), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Multiplier (35%/50%). High direct damage potential and smooth handling makes Rubico Prime a popular choice for Eidolon Hunting.

Sancti Tigris.name: Sancti Tigris
Sancti Tigris.notes: Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Purity (Corrosive, health) effect can be useful.

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.notes: Alt fire creates a localized bullet attractor field on nearby enemies' head.

Secura Penta.name: Secura Penta
Secura Penta.notes: Napalm Grenades adds 30% Status Chance (not affected by mods) and causes instant explosions while leaving a burning patch on the ground. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Shedu.name: Shedu
Shedu.notes: Depleting your ammo releases a pulse that deals Electric damage, stuns, and resets sentient resistance.

Snipetron Vandal.name: Snipetron Vandal
Snipetron Vandal.notes: Sniper combo counter rampup is average (min. 3), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (30%/50%).

Sobek.name: Sobek
Sobek.notes: Shattering Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) increases status chance while Acid Shells can be used to provide some AOE damage.

Soma Prime.name: Soma Prime
Soma Prime.notes: Best paired with Frost Prime and Scindo Prime.

Stradavar Prime.name: Stradavar Prime
Stradavar Prime.notes: Can alternate between semi-auto (better DPS) and full-auto (useful for breaking nullifier bubbles).

Supra Vandal.name: Supra Vandal
Supra Vandal.notes: Entropy Burst (Magnetic, Energy) can increase status chance, but ultimately unnecessary with current setup. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Sybaris Prime.name: Sybaris Prime
Sybaris Prime.notes: Two-round burst is wasteful at times and the magazine is relatively small for how fast it fires.

Telos Boltor.name: Telos Boltor
Telos Boltor.notes: Truth (Gas, health, parkour) syndicate proc is helpful at times.

Tenora Prime.name: Tenora Prime
Tenora Prime.notes: Has a decent alt-fire that can be used to take down medium units quickly. Light units and heavy units should still be dealt with using primary fire.

Tiberon Prime.name: Tiberon Prime
Tiberon Prime.notes: Alt-fire toggles between 3-round burst, semi-auto, and auto. Testing so far shows that burst fire has 5% edge on DPS compared to semi-auto at the expense of ammo economy.

Tigris Prime.name: Tigris Prime
Tigris Prime.notes: Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to.

Torid.name: Torid
Torid.notes: Thing fired stick on surfaces/targets and continue to emit gas that deals damage and causes status effects.

Trumna.name: Trumna
Trumna.notes: After 5 kills, use the alt fire to launch grenades.

Vaykor Hek.name: Vaykor Hek
Vaykor Hek.notes: Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects can be useful.

Vectis Prime.name: Vectis Prime
Vectis Prime.notes: Sniper combo counter rampup is slow (min. 5), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (40%/60%).

Veldt.name: Veldt
Veldt.notes: Alt-fire toggles higher magnification on zoom.

Vulkar Wraith.name: Vulkar Wraith
Vulkar Wraith.notes: Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%/70%).

Zarr.name: Zarr
Zarr.notes: First explosion from primary fire can damage self but subsequent cluster bomblets won't. Each bomblet can cause status effect on it's own. Alt fire switches to shotgun mode.

Zenith.name: Zenith
Zenith.notes: Secondary fire launches a disc that scans enemies and switches the weapon to semi-auto until the magazine is depleted. Semi-auto mode has more DPS and infinite punchthrough.

Zhuge Prime.name: Zhuge Prime
Zhuge Prime.notes: Bolts will explode a short duration after hitting a wall, potentially causing self damage.

Kuva Bramma.name: Kuva Bramma
Kuva Bramma.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Arrows explode in 7m AOE and scatter 6 bomblets.

Kuva Chakkhurr.name: Kuva Chakkhurr
Kuva Chakkhurr.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Shots explode in a small AOE after impact. Also deals 50% bonus damage on headshots.

Kuva Drakgoon.name: Kuva Drakgoon
Kuva Drakgoon.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Charged shot deals double damage and has 1.5m punchthrough.

Kuva Hind.name: Tox 60 - Kuva Hind
Kuva Hind.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Burst fire is preferred.

Kuva Kohm.name: Kuva Kohm
Kuva Kohm.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. May have some ammo issues.

Kuva Ogris.name: Kuva Ogris
Kuva Ogris.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Nightwatch Napalm leaves a flaming AOE that can be utilised to great effect.

Kuva Quartakk.name: Kuva Quartakk
Kuva Quartakk.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Switches to 4-shot burst while aiming down sight, with excellent grouping suitable for headshots.

Catchmoon - Languish.name: Catchmoon - Languish
Catchmoon - Languish.notes: Catchmoon-Tremor-Splat kitgun with R3 Pax Seeker.

Gaze - Pang Frime.name: Gaze - Pang Frime
Gaze - Pang Frime.notes: Gaze-Tremor-Splat kitgun with R3 Pax Seeker. Name chosen by Patreon vote.

Rattleguts - Upheaval.name: Rattleguts - Upheaval
Rattleguts - Upheaval.notes: Rattleguts-Tremor-Splat kitgun with R3 Pax Seeker.Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Tombfinger - Prosecution.name: Tombfinger - Prosecution
Tombfinger - Prosecution.notes: Tombfinger-Tremor-Splat kitgun with R3 Pax Seeker.

Vermisplicer - Annihilation.name: Vermisplicer - Annihilation
Vermisplicer - Annihilation.notes: Vermisplicer-Tremor-Splat kitgun with R3 Pax Seeker. Shots will create a tendril that latches on to nearby enemy. Potentially Exceptional but performed inconsistently

Sporelacer - Combustion.name: Sporelacer - Combustion
Sporelacer - Combustion.notes: Sporelacer-Tremor-Zipneedle kitgun with R3 Pax Charge. Shots will explode on contact.

Curator's Notes.notes: Schools are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

Acrid.name: Acrid
Acrid.notes: Each flechette delivers toxin DoT (scales with modified base damage and toxin damage) regardless of elemental modding.

Akarius.name: Akarius
Akarius.notes: Projetiles explode on impact with an appreciable AOE while also requiring some travel distance which will reduce self stagger. High fire rate and low ammo pool is impossible to manage without some manner of ammo mutation or restore.

Akbolto Prime.name: Akbolto Prime
Akbolto Prime.notes: Keep your friends close; keep your enemies closer. Because bolts have travel time.

Aklex Prime.name: Aklex Prime
Aklex Prime.notes: Massive recoil hurts overall DPS. Inconsistent performance.

Akstiletto Prime.name: Akstiletto Prime
Akstiletto Prime.notes: Very good all-rounder secondary. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Arca Scisco.name: Arca Scisco
Arca Scisco.notes: Each shot landed grants Target Analysis buff. Target Analysis stacks up to 5 times, lasting 2 seconds each. Critical Chance and Status Chance increases by 4% per stack.

Athodai.name: Athodai
Athodai.notes: Headshot kills grant non-refreshable fire rate buff and 100% ammo efficiency for 8 seconds. Exhibit high potential but let down by overall consistency.

Atomos.name: Atomos
Atomos.notes: Chains 7m away, even when shooting at dead bodies.

Azima.name: Azima
Azima.notes: Alt fire launches the remaining clip that will act as a 4-point dumb turret.

Ballistica Prime.name: Ballistica Prime
Ballistica Prime.notes: Charged shot kills turns the target into a ghostly specter for 7 seconds. Inconsistent performance.

Catabolyst.name: Catabolyst
Catabolyst.notes: Reloading throws a grenade that deals more damage the less ammo remaining in the clip. Pairs well with Arcane Avenger due to high Crit Multiplier.

Cycron.name: Cycron
Cycron.notes: Does not have an ammo reserve. Ammo in clip regenerates over time when not firing.

Dex Furis.name: Dex Furis
Dex Furis.notes: Despite being called the Furis, it uses the Afuris riven. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Dual Toxocyst.name: Dual Toxocyst
Dual Toxocyst.notes: Headshot grants Frenzy buff. Frenzy lasts 3 seconds and can be refreshed. Frenzy grants 100% increase in Toxin damage (on base damage), 15% increase in fire rate, recoil reduction, and doesn't consume ammo while firing.

Epitaph.name: Epitaph
Epitaph.notes: Charged shots forces Impact proc and has 2m punchthrough. Exhibit high potential but let down by overall consistency.

Euphona Prime.name: Euphona Prime
Euphona Prime.notes: Alt-fire switches to multi-pellet mode that can achieve 100% status chance when modded properly. However, slug mode firing has superior DPS and hybrid modding will gimp both builds. Inconsistent performance.

Fusilai.name: Fusilai
Fusilai.notes: Alt-fire launches three throwing knives horizontally instead.

Hystrix.name: Hystrix
Hystrix.notes: Bolts munitions have pros and cons. Clip is small for fire rate and despite quick reload will end up being annoying. Alt-fire changes elemental damage to one of four basic types (Fire, Ice, Poison, Electricity) with guaranteed procs which scales more if corresponding elemental mod is installed.

Knell.name: Knell
Knell.notes: Headshot grants Death Knell buff. Death Knell can stack up to 3 times, lasting 3 seconds per stack. Stack-count regardless, 20% status chance and infinite ammo is granted. Critical Multiplier increases (x1.5, x2., x2.5) per stack.

Kompressa.name: Kompressa
Kompressa.notes: Exhibit high potential but let down by overall consistency.

Kulstar.name: Kulstar
Kulstar.notes: Rocket impact will release 3 additional bomblets.

Kunai.name: Kunai
Kunai.notes: Good luck landing a precise shot.

Lex Prime.name: Lex Prime
Lex Prime.notes: Massive recoil hurts overall DPS. Inconsistent performance.

Nukor.name: Nukor
Nukor.notes: Hitting a specific part multiple times increases damage dealt to that part by 5%. Unusually, Nukor has very high Critical Multiplier but poor Critical Chance, hence it's DPS increase from flat Crit Chance modifiers is relatively higher than other weapons.

Ocucor.name: Ocucor
Ocucor.notes: Each enemy killed will create an additional tendril that damages other targettable enemies in sight. Tendrils reset upon reloading. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Pandero Prime.name: Pandero Prime
Pandero Prime.notes: Alt-fire empties clip onto enemy with some worrying recoil.

Pox.name: Pox
Pox.notes: Firing launches gas darts that will fill a moderate AOE with gas. Modding 100% status is highly recommended. Inconsistent performance.

Prisma Angstrum.name: Prisma Angstrum
Prisma Angstrum.notes: Multishot causes the rocket to spread out further. Can be charged to launch more rockets at once.

Pyrana Prime.name: Pyrana Prime
Pyrana Prime.notes: Killing 3 enemies within 3 seconds summons another Pyrana Prime for 5 seconds, which increases your fire rate by 40% and current ammo (of which up to 12 remains after it is gone).

Quatz.name: Quatz
Quatz.notes: Reloading when the clip is emptied causes an Electric damage proc (with 100% status chance) around you.

Sancti Castanas.name: Sancti Castanas
Sancti Castanas.notes: Purity (Corrosive, health) can be useful at times.

Secura Dual Cestra.name: Secura Dual Cestra
Secura Dual Cestra.notes: Sequence (Radiation, shields) can be useful at times.

Sepulcrum.name: Sepulcrum
Sepulcrum.notes: After 5 kills, secondary fiee to enable lock-on targetting up to 5 targets and fire to launch 5 shots at the selected enemies. Exhibit high potential but let down by overall consistency.

Sicarus Prime.name: Sicarus Prime
Sicarus Prime.notes: Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Sonicor.name: Sonicor
Sonicor.notes: The tenno space program has been replaced by the tenno ragdoll simulator. Explosions may cause status effects.

Staticor.name: Staticor
Staticor.notes: Bolt and resulting explosion has independent chance to proc status effects, making it highly capable of layering additional status effects. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Stug.name: Stug
Stug.notes: Each shot launches a blob. Up to six blobs can accumulate at a single site on the target. Alt-fire charges the weapon to launch a single, larger blob. While the shots itself does not cause status effects, the blobs do. Inconsistent performance.

Synoid Gammacor.name: Synoid Gammacor
Synoid Gammacor.notes: Innate Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) is useful at times.

Twin Kohmak.name: Twin Kohmak
Twin Kohmak.notes: Spool up increases pellets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs.

Vaykor Marelok.name: Vaykor Marelok
Vaykor Marelok.notes: Justice (Blast, health, armor) can be helpful at times.

Velox.name: Velox
Velox.notes: Exhibit high potential but let down by overall consistency.

Zakti Prime.name: Zakti Prime
Zakti Prime.notes: Pellets explode after landing, causing Impact status and Gas damage and status. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Zymos.name: Zymos
Zymos.notes: Headshots releases spores after a short priming period. Exhibit high potential but let down by overall consistency.

Baleful Purifier.name: Gaze - Baleful Purifier
Baleful Purifier.notes: Gaze-Haymaker-Killstream kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker highly recommended.

Thunderous Rancor.name: Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor
Thunderous Rancor.notes: Rattleguts-Lovetap-Splat kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker highly recommended.

Mordant Meteor.name: Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor
Mordant Meteor.notes: Tombfinger-Haymaker-Stitch kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker highly recommended.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Kuva Kraken.name: Tox 60 - Kuva Kraken
Kuva Kraken.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Three-round burst may be wasteful at times. Alt-fire expends remainder of the magazine in a single burst.Inconsistent performance.

Kuva Nukor.name: Heat 60 - Kuva Nukor
Kuva Nukor.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Beam chains up to 4 times with decreasing damage in a 10m AOE. Beam also has a small width that can damage enemies to the side of it. Pairs well with Arcane Avenger due to high Crit Multiplier.

Kuva Seer.name: Tox 60 - Kuva Seer
Kuva Seer.notes: Tested with 60% Toxin bonus. Shots explode upon impact for corrosive damaage. Inconsistent performance.

Harbinger of Devastation.name: Sporelacer - Harbinger of Devastation
Harbinger of Devastation.notes: Sporelacer-Haymaker-Zipneedle kitgun. R3 Pax Charge mandatory.

Chains of Malice.name: Vermisplicer - Chains of Malice
Chains of Malice.notes: Vermisplicer-Haymaker-Stitch kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker highly recommended.Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Fusion Array.name: Catchmoon - Fusion Array
Fusion Array.notes: Catchmoon-Haymaker-Killstream kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker mandatory. Exceptional potential but inconsistent.

Curator's Notes.notes: Sentinel Weapons are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

frame.text: Frames are currently being redone. Please be patient as that part of the list is worked on.

subjectivity.name: subjectivity
subjectivity.question: How are weapons on the list ranked?
subjectivity.text: Weapons are tested by our robust testing methodology, found in the FAQ and Notes links.

perfIndex.name: perfIndex
perfIndex.question: What is Perf Index?
perfIndex.text:
This is a quantified numerical value to determine how powerful a weapon is compared to its peers (other weapons in the same arsenal slot).

Index score of 100 is always held by the best non-special weapon in that arsenal slot. Special weapons are mostly modular weapons and/or weapons that go beyond the standard 30 levels like Zaws, Kitguns, Kuva Weapons and Paracesis.

Example interpretation: a score that is 120 will mean that the clear time of weapon is about 20% faster than the top non-special weapon, while a score of 25 will mean it takes 4x as long to clear the oro100 gauntlet compared to top non-special weapon.

This scoring system has been created to help users quantify the exact gap between the weapons' performance.

baseItems.name: baseItems
baseItems.question: Where is x base/event item?
baseItems.text: Base/event items are no longer tested and therefore no longer maintained.

frameBuilds.name: frameBuilds
frameBuilds.question: How should Frame builds be used?
frameBuilds.text:
Warframes are not ranked within a tier and represent their respective power considering the current meta but going from Top to Contender and then to Viable does signify reduced capabilities and/or importance.

Frame builds are based on build goals that should be aspired to. The precise build differs from play style and preference, and therefore can't be fixed. Nonetheless, future updates will include example builds.

checkTheLinks.name: checkTheLinks
checkTheLinks.question: What about Zaws and Kitguns?
checkTheLinks.text: Please refer to the Weapon name links for Zaws and Kitguns. Also click on the builds' link to see it.

dispute.name: dispute
dispute.question: I disagree with a ranking; where can I provide input?
dispute.text: If you have any issues with rankings/builds, please visit the Discord server to discuss about them.
